item.description:
Let's get out'a town and enjoy some Winter FUN!

• Approximate arrival Friday, February 18th evening Happy Hour.
• Saturday we head to Cranmore's Mountain end enjoy coaster rides, tubing, or skiing if you wish.
• The balance of our stay we can explore the area of Mt. Washington.
Plans of course are flexible, however we do need to book the hotel now.

Cranmore’s Mountain Coaster Adventure: The Coaster is thousands of feet of twisting, turning fun through the woods! You control your speed so you may take a leisurely ride or get your thrills at speeds up to 25 mph. Coaster Ticket Pricing: Single Ride: $9; 3 Rides: $23

Cranmore Tubing Park: Ten lanes wide and served by both a magic-carpet style surface lift and a handle-tow lift. Tubing Ticket Pricing: $23 for 2-Hours

Tubing & Coaster Combo Ticket: 2 hours tubing and 3 rides on the Mountain Coaster: $35

Lodging: Come and enjoy old fashioned hospitality and breathtaking views at a family owned and operated motel. They are conveniently located within walking distance of the picturesque village of North Conway and are minutes from the areas many outdoor attractions.

Room Rates:
• Two Queen beds, can sleep up to 4 people - $106/night
• One Queen bed, can sleep up to 2 people - $93/night

Please correspond with parties you'd like to room and carpool with so hotel reservations can be made ASAP. Please email or call me once your plans are set. You will pay direct. Plans need to be confirmed for hotel stay by 1/15, if after you'll need to do directly.

You are welcome to come Saturday and stay one night if there is availability. There is a motel charge for cancellations, and if your rooming with someone and you need to cancel please find a replacement.

Cranmore Mountain info: http://www.cranmore.c...
Hotel info: http://thecolonialmot...

This trip is for MEN and WOMEN!
item.name: Winter Weekend Trip to Cranmore Mountain
